channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 17:23 Air alarm to Sinelnikovsky District to follow further reports.
item.description: 🔴 17:23 Air alarm to Sinelnikovsky District to follow further reports. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
